medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant and left lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began this morning at 2 am. The patient experienced pain in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and left lower quadrant (LLQ), with possible presence in the left upper quadrant (LUQ). Initially, the pain was present upon waking, subsequently improved after taking GasX and Gavascane. The patient reports anorexia and loose stools in the evening but denies headache, fever, constipation, nausea, or vomiting.
medical_history.family_history: Type 2 diabetes and lung cancer on mother's side of family.
